title: Drawing, "Study: Amaryllis", early 20th century
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor on yellow tracing paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 2
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting two sprays of amaryllis with foliage.  The blossoms have been heightened with red and white, while the leaves are shaded green and gray.
